#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
long long int n,m,i,j,q,r,t,k;
long long int xx;
int main()
{
	cin>>t;
	for(m=0;m<t;m++)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cin>>k;
		priority_queue<long long int, vector<long long int>, greater<long long int> > pq;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>xx;
			pq.push(xx);
		}
		int mod=(k-2)-(n-2)%(k-1);
		while(mod--)
	    	pq.push(0LL);
		long long int sum = 0;
		long long int total = 0;
		while(pq.size()>1)
		{
			sum = 0;
			int cnt=min((int)k,(int)pq.size());
			for(i=0;i<cnt;i++)
			{
				sum+=pq.top();
				//cout<<pq.top()<<" ";
				pq.pop();
			}
			//cout<<sum<<endl;
			pq.push(sum);
			total+=sum;
		}
		printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",m+1,total);
	}
	return 0;
}
